alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 4:33AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following county, Cascade. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 432 AM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated rain and snowmelt due to showers and thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Belt, Neihart, Sluice Boxes State Park, Armington, Stockett, Centerville, Monarch, Tracy and Sand Coulee. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
